entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE AND VERY LIGHT FREEZING DRIZZLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
